# freeCodeCamp-roman-numeral-converter

[![Bulma](https://img.shields.io/badge/Bulma-0.9.4-00d1b2?logo=data:image/png;base64,)](https://bulma.io) [![Vite](https://img.shields.io/badge/Vite-4.4.5-646CFF)](https://vitejs.dev)

Solution to freeCodeCamp's Roman Numeral Converter project using JavaScript, and Bulma CSS. Bundled with Vite.
